content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to craft 3 iron_ingot. To craft an iron_ingot, I need to smelt iron_ore. Therefore I will move the iron_block from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have now crafted the iron_ingot, and will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to place 3 iron_ingot in a row in the crafting table, therefore I will move the iron_ingot from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
